quotes.quote: Sunday night I always cook if I can - if I'm home, I always cook.
On Sunday night, my husband makes a five-course family dinner.
A night of a Sunday can confuse the Monday morning, if Sunday's night dream is misinterpreted.
On one Sunday Night remember your dreams that just stay behind.
You're just like a Sunday morning feeling so comfortable and right. Be the wind, be the seas. Be whatever you please. But just be here on Sunday night.
Crazy on a Sunday night, you make me dance like a fool.
Sunday night's the night for loving and squeezing out the weekend's last drops. Sunday night's the night for forgiving. Maybe that's why they shut the shops.
It's Sunday nights and birds in flight. It's whistleing in the street. It's all you'll ever need.
I don't mind Sunday night at all 'cause that's the night friends come to call and Monday to Friday go fast and another week is past.
Sunday night, you had a date, and from the looks of everything, it's clear that I don't rate.
Sunday is the golden clasp that binds together the volume of the week.
We are on Sunday night because that is where they put us 30 odd years ago. I think we became a habit.
A Sunday well-spent brings a week of content.
Sunday night was such a big night for television when I was growing up you know, The Wonderful World of Disney.
Sunday evenings often feel like the weekend is over before it's even begun.
Sunday night and now I know how the night can pass slow.
I'm taking up praying on Sunday nights.
